key.name: format-string
key.description: strftime format string for the top bar clock.

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to refresh the label.

key.name: only-topbar
key.description: If true, only modify the GNOME top bar DateMenu label, leaving other panels/taskbars untouched.

key.name: smooth-second
key.description: Align the first update to the next second boundary when the interval is 1s.
